basic_information.scholarship_name: Jay and Tricia Evans Scholarship in Real Estate

description: Must be a full time student with a declared real estate minor. Must provide statement of need and work history while enrolled at school. Real Estate program director must provide a recommendation. Eligibility Requirements Declared Real Estate minor Enrolled full-time Provide statement of need Provide work history while enrolled at school Real Estate program director must provide a recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Minor_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Minor_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Finance-Real Estate
criteria.clean_description: Major: Finance-Real Estate | Minor: Finance-Real Estate
